page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: Two pre-school opportunities are available to youngsters -to go for mornings or afternoons to Madras Nursery in Neilston; or to join a playgroup run by mothers in the Mure Hall,Uplawmoor,twice a week. Uplawmoor Primary School is home to seventy pupils and three teachers.Here a full primary education is enjoyed,as well as many extra sporting activites with the help of parents. Pupils are encouraged to learn about and work in the environment - this Domesday work is an example. Secondary education is provided at Eastwood High School to which pupils are bussed as it is ten miles away. Some parents seek private education for their children, considering the quality of education,discipline and prestige preferable.
